title: An Idea for Riots Next Game. If it has to be League of Legends Themed.
body:
If anyone has played, Company of Heroes or that similar game but Lord of The Rings themed, you would know what I am talking about.

I feel like that would be a perfect style of game for Riot's story, characters, and landscape. They could team up with Relic Entertainment, who already has experience making such games. (or not.)
But given how much people want to see the world of Runeterra, the cultures, the people, and maybe even their favorite champions in war. This is a perfect game style.

Sorry, but I do not know what those types of games are called, I know it is not a MOBA.
